content: free pattern - f66 onete scarf by fairmount fibers design team all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 6/3/16 © fairmount fibers ltd 2016 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 3 free pattern - f66 size p purl 68 wingspan x 23 depth from center neck repeat repeat rs right side materials slm slip marker manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino ssk slip next 2 stitches one at a time as if to knit 30% silk approx 490 yds/100g 1 skip shown in 430 return both stitches to left needle then knit them filigree together through back of loops 1 st decreased st s stitch es us 8/5mm needle 24 or longer or size to ws wrong side obtain gauge yo yarnover 1 st increased 2 ring markers instructions gauge cast on 1 st 13 sts and 26 row = 4 over garter stitch knit set-up row 1 rs knit into the front back and every row front of same st 3 sts set-up row 2 knit abbreviations set-up row 3 k1 m1rfb place m k1 place m k knit m1lfb k1 7 sts k2tog knit 2 stitches together 1 st decreased set-up row 4 knit m marker m1l insert tip of left needle from front to back row 1 k1 m1r k to m m1l slm k1 slm m1r k to under running strand between last stitch and last st m1l k1 4 sts increased next stitch then knit through back of loop 1 st row 2 knit increased repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 259 sts 129 m1lfb insert tip of left needle from front to back sts at each side plus the center st ending having under running strand between last stitch and next just worked row 2 stitch knit into the back of this stitch and then the front 2 sts increased eyelet edging m1r insert tip of left needle from back to front row 1 rs k1 yo k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 under running strand between last stitch and st before m yo k1 slm k1 slm k1 yo *ssk yo repeat next stitch then knit through front of loop 1 st from * to last 2 sts k1 yo k1 263 sts increased row 2 knit m1rfb insert tip of left needle from back to front row 3 k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * to 2 sts before knit into the front of this stitch and then the back m yo k1 yo k1 slm k1 slm k1 yo k1 *yo ssk repeat 2 sts increased from * to last st yo k1 267 sts all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 6/3/16 © fairmount fibers ltd 2016 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 free pattern - f66 row 4 knit row 8 knit row 5
